ai-patthana22.19:0.2_0: under the influence of the Dhamma: the Protector of the Three Worlds
ai-patthana22.19:0.3_0: Only bodily strength, etc., are these causes, and conditions for the sake of a hundred years.
ai-patthana22.19:1.1_0: or causes and reasons for giving up not grasping.
ai-patthana22.19:1.1_1: Nine namely constructed nine, the nine sets of six. ...
ai-patthana22.19:2.1_0: Not grasping arises in someone who doesn’t give rise to the teaching, or for the sake of grasping.
